1. Authentication (Admins & Guards)

POST /auth/admin/login → Admin login (email + password) → returns JWT

POST /auth/admin/register → Create new admin (for bootstrap only, or super-admin controlled)

POST /auth/guard/login → Guard login (phone/email + PIN/password)

POST /auth/logout → Invalidate token

Test Cases

✅ Admin login with correct email/password → success

❌ Wrong password → 401 Unauthorized

✅ JWT token required for all protected routes

2. Admin Dashboard - Manage Personnel

POST /personnel → Add personnel (generate QR code & PIN)
req: {
  "national_id": "123456789023",
  "fname": "Alice",
  "lname": "Smith",
  "photoUrl": "https://example.com/alice.jpg",
  "expirationDate": "2025-12-31T23:59:59Z",
  "assignedEmplacementId": "653db70d-61b0-45bb-af86-6404f0762843", // Use the ID from the created emplacement
  "phone": "999-888-7777",
  "service": "Logistics",
  "isActive": true
}

GET /personnel → List all personnel (filters: active/inactive, emplacement)

GET /personnel/:id → Get details of one personnel

PUT /personnel/:id → Update personnel info (photo, PIN, assigned emplacement, etc.)

DELETE /personnel/:id → Deactivate or remove personnel

PATCH /personnel/:id/status → Activate/Deactivate personnel

Test Cases

✅ Add personnel → QR code generated & stored

❌ Try to add with duplicate national_id → 400 Conflict

✅ Personnel PIN is securely hashed, not plaintext

3. Emplacement Management

POST /emplacements → Create new emplacement

GET /emplacements → List all emplacements

GET /emplacements/:id → Get one emplacement

PUT /emplacements/:id → Update emplacement info

DELETE /emplacements/:id → Remove emplacement

Test Cases

✅ Create emplacement with valid JSON for accessMethod & exitMethod

❌ Delete emplacement that has assigned personnel → handle gracefully (set NULL)

4. Kiosk Devices

POST /kiosks → Register kiosk device

GET /kiosks → List kiosks (filter by isOnline)

PUT /kiosks/:id/online → Update device online status (heartbeat ping)

DELETE /kiosks/:id → Remove kiosk

Test Cases

✅ Kiosk pings backend every X seconds → status updated

❌ If kiosk doesn’t ping → automatically mark offline

5. Guards & Assignments

POST /guards → Add guard

GET /guards → List guards

GET /guards/:id → Guard details

PUT /guards/:id → Update guard info

DELETE /guards/:id → Remove guard

Guard-Kiosk Assignment

POST /assignments → Assign guard → kiosk

DELETE /assignments/:id → Remove assignment

Test Cases

✅ Assign guard to kiosk → entry in GuardKioskAssignment

❌ Assign same guard twice → 409 Conflict

6. Access & Exit Requests (Frontend Kiosk Flow)

POST /access/scan → Scan QR code → returns personnel ID & requires PIN

POST /access/verify-pin → Submit PIN for verification

POST /access/verify-face → Optional biometric verification (photoEmbeddings match)

POST /access/verify-fingerprint → Optional fingerprint verification

POST /access/grant → Final decision → creates Request row + log entry

POST /exit/scan → Scan QR code for exit

POST /exit/grant → Exit confirmed

Test Cases

✅ QR scanned → valid personnel returned

❌ Expired personnel QR → 403 Forbidden

✅ Correct PIN entered → allow access

❌ Wrong PIN 3 times → lockout / alert guard

7. Logs

GET /logs → List all logs (filters: success/failure, personnel, emplacement, date range)

GET /logs/:id → Single log entry

Test Cases

✅ Every access/exit attempt → log generated

✅ Logs contain hash for blockchain verification

❌ Tamper with log → mismatch with blockchain

8. Blockchain

GET /blockchain/chain → Get full blockchain data

POST /blockchain/validate → Validate chain integrity

GET /blockchain/blocks/:index → Get block by index

Test Cases

✅ New access log → new block added

✅ Validation endpoint confirms integrity

❌ If block tampered → validation fails

9. Daily Summary

POST /daily-summary/generate → Generate daily report

GET /daily-summary → List all daily summaries

GET /daily-summary/:date → Get summary by date

PUT /daily-summary/:id/review → Mark reviewed

Test Cases

✅ End of day → auto-generate summary with stats

✅ Daily summary includes failedEntries & topAlertZones

❌ Duplicate summary for same date → blocked

✅ End-to-End Flow Example (Kiosk Frontend)

Scan QR → /access/scan

Enter PIN → /access/verify-pin

Biometric optional → /access/verify-face or /access/verify-fingerprint

If all checks pass → /access/grant → adds Request + Log + Block
